name: Cube Board Hell #gmtkjam
description:
Cube Board Hell has been created during the #GMTKJam with the theme "Out of control".

I did this jam with my friend LapinLambda.  We made it on two different engines : Godot for me and GameMaker for him (you can download his version here!)

We couldn't finish the jam on time but it is better late than never isn't it? 

In this arcade game, cubes appear and you have to shoot them thanks to your keyboard. But cubes can also appear too far... So you need to shift your keyboard on left/right to access to them. This game is short, a bit difficult at the beginning, but we think it's very funny to play, So, we hope you enjoy it too, and try to make the best score ! ;)

Informations :

Music/Graphism : @LapinLambda

Code : Me !
